polytech.devint.view.swing

Class SwingView<M extends Model>

  • java.lang.Object
    • polytech.devint.event.Observable
      • polytech.devint.view.View<M>
        • polytech.devint.view.DevintView<M>
          • polytech.devint.view.swing.SwingView<M>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingMenuView

    public abstract class SwingView<M extends Model>
extends DevintView<M>
    Represents a Swing View. This view contains a JFrame and a JPanel when initialized. You must use the main JPanel
    Author:
    Gunther Jungbluth (gunther.jungbluth.poirier@gmail.com), Loris Friedel

      • isAutoUpdateEnabled

        public boolean isAutoUpdateEnabled()
        Returns:
        True is the auto update system is currently active, false otherwise.

      • enableAutoUpdate

        public void enableAutoUpdate()
        Activate the auto update system. By default, it is activated. This system automatically update JLabel and JPanel font and color according to the current display configuration of the program.

      • disableAutoUpdate

        public void disableAutoUpdate()
        Disable the auto update system. JPanel and JLabel in this swing view will no longer be updated automatically.

      • getUpdatedFont

        protected java.awt.Font getUpdatedFont(java.awt.Font font)
        Get from the current display configuration the new font that corresponds to the one we uses, but updated according to the current size of font defined by the user.
        Parameters:
        font - font we are currently using
        Returns:
        the font updated according to the current font size of the global display configuration
